name: @monomarket/root
description: MonoMarket Tickets - Event marketplace platform monorepo

scripts.start: cd apps/api && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/main.js
scripts.contracts:build: pnpm run contracts:generate && pnpm --filter @monomarket/contracts run build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run contracts:build && pnpm run config:build
scripts.dev: pnpm run contracts:generate && pnpm run build:packages && concurrently "pnpm run dev:api" "pnpm run dev:web"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter @monomarket/api run build && pnpm --filter @monomarket/web run build
